content: Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit Titanium drills bits with a 1/4 shank used in impact drivers. Optimized for metal drilling in steel, stainless and cast iron. ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- ### FEATURES:Features Titanium coating provides longer life compared to black oxide drill bits 135-degree split point for no-predrilling and immediate engagement Applications Designed to drill through various metals including steel, aluminum, stainless and cast iron Enhances productivity when drilling and screw fastening can be completed with a single impact driver ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 3903423 - 1/16 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903424 - 3/32 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903419 - 1/8 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903421 - 5/32 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903420 - 3/16 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903429 - 3/8 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 6 pc - 3903427 - 7/16 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 6 pc - 3903425 - 7/32 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903418 - 1/4 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903426 - 9/32 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903422 - 5/16 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 12 pc - 3903428 - 1/2 Titanium Hex Shank Drill Bit 135° - Package Size 6 pc
